This website is AudioEye enabled and is being optimized for accessibility. To open the AudioEye Toolbar, press "shift + =". Some assistive technologies may require the use of a passthrough function before this keystroke. For more information, activate the button labeled “Explore your accessibility options”.

City Council
============

![P13333077](https://www.elizabethnj.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=7048)

Ward Map
--------

**Click on the [Map](https://www.elizabethnj.org/DocumentCenter/View/6877/Full-Ward-Map-and-1-6) to locate what ward you reside in and who your Council Member is.**

[![Screenshot 2024-01-17 095929 Opens in new window](https://www.elizabethnj.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=6876)](https://www.elizabethnj.org/DocumentCenter/View/6877/Full-Ward-Map-and-1-6)

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://www.elizabethnj.org/AgendaCenter/City-Council-3)

Block Watch Meetings
--------------------

[View Meeting Schedule](https://www.elizabethnj.org/calendar.aspx?CID=34)

Council Meetings
----------------

[View Meeting Schedule](https://www.elizabethnj.org/calendar.aspx?CID=35&showPastEvents=false)

City Clerk Office
-----------------

50 Winfield Scott Plaza 

Room 105

Elizabeth, NJ 07202

Monday - Friday: 9:00AM - 4:00PM

908-820-4131
